title: 1960-1970's Ford F350 Flatbed Truck
item_description:
1960-1970's Ford F350 Flatbed Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 1960-1970's
    • Unable to verify year. However via a 3rd party website, vehicle may be a 1964 please bid accordingly (description updated 12:42pm on /12/2025)
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F350
  • VIN: F35CR471466
    • VIN RECORD NOT ON FILE.
  • Odometer Reads: 90,382
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 10,000 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: V6
  • Tire Size: 7.50-16LT
  • Deck Length: 108”
  • Deck Width: 87”
  • Wall Height: 7”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Other
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Beige

Condition Unknown. Buyer is responsible for all aspects of loading and removal of this lot. No assistance will be provided by West Auctions.

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-3 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
